00003 =                             MtkDegMinSecToDd                              =

00017 #include "MisrUnitConv.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 
00033 MTKt_status MtkDegMinSecToDd(
00034   int deg,    
00035   int min,    
00036   double sec, 
00037   double *dd   )
00038 {
00039   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00040   int sgn;                      /* Sign of input */
00041   
00042   if (dd == NULL)
00043     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00044 
00045   /* determine sign */
00046 
00047   if (deg < 0) {
00048     sgn = -1;
00049   } else {
00050     sgn = 1;
00051   }
00052   deg = (int)fabs(deg);
00053 
00054   /* Check degrees, minutes, seconds bounds */
00055 
00056   if (deg > 360) return MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00057   if (min > 60) return MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00058   if (sec > 60.0) return MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00059 
00060   *dd = sgn * (deg * 3600.0 + min * 60.0 + sec) / 3600.0;
00061 
00062   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00063 
00064 ERROR_HANDLE:
00065   return status_code;
00066 }
